text:
@CNN Exactly what he wanted all along. Pathetic. Using COVID-19 fears to fuel his xenophobic goals. 

I mean I get it. Things aren’t safe in the world right now and we gotta protect ourselves but still, this was EXACTLY what he wanted the whole time.
